name: GetCampaignDetails
description:
Retrieve details and metrics for a specific marketing campaign.

Use this tool to get detailed information about a marketing campaign using its campaignGuid. It also provides information about associated assets, and if start and end dates are given, metrics for those assets.

parameters.name: campaign_guid
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, formatted as a UUID.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, formatted as a UUID.

parameters.name: metrics_start_date
parameters.description: Start date for fetching asset metrics. Format as YYYY-MM-DD. Metrics are only retrieved if both start and end dates are provided.

value_schema.description:
Start date to fetch asset metrics, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. This date is used to fetch the metrics associated with the assets for a specified period.
If not provided, no asset metrics will be fetched.

parameters.name: end_date_for_asset_metrics
parameters.description: End date to fetch asset metrics, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. If omitted, no metrics will be retrieved.

value_schema.description:
End date to fetch asset metrics, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. This date is used to fetch the metrics associated with the assets for a specified period.
If not provided, no asset metrics will be fetched.

parameters.name: properties_list
parameters.description: List specific properties to return in the response. Leave empty for an empty properties map.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties has empty value on the requested object, they will be ignored and not returned in response. If this parameter is empty, the response will include an empty properties map.

metadata.description: Arcade Starter tools for LLMs to interact directly with the low-level Hubspot Marketing API

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
Start date to fetch asset metrics, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. This date is used to fetch the metrics associated with the assets for a specified period.
If not provided, no asset metrics will be fetched.

value_schema.description:
Start date to fetch asset metrics, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. This date is used to fetch the metrics associated with the assets for a specified period.
If not provided, no asset metrics will be fetched.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
End date to fetch asset metrics, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. This date is used to fetch the metrics associated with the assets for a specified period.
If not provided, no asset metrics will be fetched.

value_schema.description:
End date to fetch asset metrics, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. This date is used to fetch the metrics associated with the assets for a specified period.
If not provided, no asset metrics will be fetched.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties has empty value on the requested object, they will be ignored and not returned in response. If this parameter is empty, the response will include an empty properties map.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties has empty value on the requested object, they will be ignored and not returned in response. If this parameter is empty, the response will include an empty properties map.

parameters.name: campaignGuid
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, formatted as a UUID.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, formatted as a UUID.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
